content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking cigarette, noticed bright star like object approaching from s.S.E., very high, no sound, no strobes, turned right to e.N.E, same brightness, turned into red-orange dot , then out of sight, long before reaching horizon.
content.summary: Light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Standing on front porch looking for the moon it was supposed to be clear that night when i look north and saw 5 red lights some were blinking with 3 in a triangular shape in the front with an shapeless orange light that seemed to be leading   (not like the red which were points of light. sort of a blob shape to the light. not round  ) 2 red points of light horizontal in alignment in the back. the last light was blinking. [( *^..) crude shape but you should get the idea]  moved together in a east to west direction. thought it was helicopter but this had no sound and no white or blue lights. so i thought maybe its military but still no sound. oh well, its a nice silent reeeeallllllly slow helicopter the air force has, i thought. i thought this until i heard about morristown same red lights but morristown didn't have the orange light. and the lights i saw stayed together. i really cant tell you the altitude but i know it was way under the cloud level. possibly within the standard helicopter altitude. if this is true it was larger than a standard helicopter from the orange light to the last red point of light which was blinking. i lost sight of it when it was so far west of my house it blended in with the city lights. i have included a very crude .Bmp file to illustrate what i saw.
content.summary: 5 red lights, 3 in a triangular shape, 2 red points of light horizontal in alignment.

content.detailedDescription: On oct. 29, '08 i was camped in site 5 loop a of squaw flats campground, needles district, canyonlands nat'l park in utah.  i sat at my campfire facing to the south. the night was cloudless and the sky was were extraordinarily clear.  something caused me to look up and i saw a brilliant red light (with pinkish/purplish overtones) sitting motionless in the southwest sky.  the object was 20-25 degrees above the horizon and from my viewpoint appeared to be about the size of a pea.  were i pressed i would say it was a mile away but i can offer no logical explanation for that impression.  my first quick thought was that it was an aircraft warning light atop a communications tower of some kind but then i remembered where i was and knew it could be no such thing and besides it was too big and bright for that.  i had been looking at the stars through my binoculars ever since nightfall so i then used them to look at the object.  it looked bigger and brighter but i still could not tell whether the object was only the light itself, or whether the light was attached to something larger. after viewing it for 12-13 seconds (maybe 4 of those seconds through the binoculars) it suddenly accelerated and moved at a teriffic rate of speed to the east.  once it began to move i took the binoculars from my eyes and watched for 5-6 more seconds until it disappeared behind some juniper trees on the eastern edge of my campsite.  the object was silent and flew in a straight line.  it gave an impression of fantastic power and grace and just as it disappeared i said to myself, "oh, please come back.....I want to have a better look at you."  a minute or two later i went to my camper and found it was exactly 8:30 meaning i must have seen the object at about 8:28.  there were three men camped in the next site over (to the west) and they too were around their fire but i didn't hear any excitement or commotion over there so presume they didn't see it.
content.summary: A bright red light sat in the sky then suddenly moved rapidly to the east until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my room playing playstation and heard what i thought was a helicopter. every once and a while there is a helicopter that hovers throughout my neighborhood. so i looked out my window and saw 4 bright red lights with  strobing white lights. so i went down stairs to show my mom out my livingroom window. she was amazed by the fomation that the lights were flying in, and the way they moved. they moved up and down in a diagonal zig-zag pattern. after a couple of minutes possibly arround five, they disappeard behind trees. so i went outside and saw the helicopter that i originaly was looking out for. for about two hours after that there was an uncoutable amount of helicopters all over the place. i know that there is a flight pattern arround the area of my house but this was no airplane or helicopter i have ever seen. 
     i submitted this because i saw the video on historychannel.Com (morristown lights) morristown nj. what i saw looked just like that. as soon as i saw it i amediately got chills and goosebumps going down my body. it was really freaky.
content.summary: 4 bright red lights.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girl friend went out to the beach to take some pictures of stars with a fancy camra a friend let us borrow.When we got home to look at the pictures this is what we saw.This is not a hokes  please contact back! [cms/pid/tg] have more pictures
content.summary: Never saw with naked eye only have photos.

content.detailedDescription: Did not see this object.  but believe no one would see an object traveling at this speed during daytime.  may be meteor or space junk, but think anything large enough to make a hole in the clouds and moving this fast would have caused some damage when it hit the ground.
content.summary: Took photo at 250th of second. did not see until downloaded on computer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was amongst a group of revellers walking back to our room when i spotted "mars" in the sky.  the sky was very clear with the moon as a small crescent and jupiter lighting up the western sky.

in the crowd of people were my fiance, my eleven year-old son and a group of other people that we did not know.

i then realized that mars could not be in the sky at that position and the red light source was brighter than even jupiter.  someone suggested that it was a helicopter, but there was no starboad green light and no strobe.  there was also no sound from the object.  

the object remained stationary for about four minutes then started to move slowly in our direction.  when the object was almost directly over our head it stopped once again.  we could not make out the form of the object but at this point it was even brighter than when we first saw the object.

after about a minute the object started to fade out and then blinked out of sight.  the "fade" took about ten seconds to happen and we presume that the object went straight up.


the following day i was in the bar and met five people from montreal.  they also saw the object and were very excited to hear my story.  they stayed up later than we did and reported that the object "came back" at about 1:15.  they described the object as coming in from the west slowly and stopping above them, just out to sea.  it remained stationary for about five minutes then gradually accellerated away towards the east and vanished.
content.summary: New years eve sighting of mars like moving star.

content.detailedDescription: Left my house to go meet some friends to go play pool when i saw off in the distance these 3 light that made up a triangle formation. i was driving on the highway trying to get a good view of this but was hard since i was on the highway. this thing whatever it was, was huge ..The formation it was in was at least a mile across. i knew right away this wasn't a plane this thing had 3 lights on the front and the lights were so far spaced apart that theres no way it could've been a conventional aircraft. i do live near an airforce base and i see the c-130's flying in all the time but their light formation on the c-130's is much different. i knew it was something other than a c-130. the amount of sky it took up was just amazing. this object was huge. eventually lost sight of it when i drove further down the highway.

I went out to walk my dogs and was standing in the street in front of my house when my dogs suddenly ran out of the darkness and sat on my feet.  at that moment i felt like i should look behind me, as i looked over my shoulder i saw a large brilliant white light with an orange halo radiating around the outside of the object, it was about 300 feet away traveling at treetop level in a s.W. direction from hwy 19 s.  it was in my field of vision for about 5 seconds, before it disappeared on the other side of the trees. it appeared to be bigger than a large helicopter would be at that distance and i've seen helicopters very often in this area, and it certainly wasn't an airplane.
content.summary: Brilliant white light with orange radiate light around outside flew silently @ treetop level in s.W. direction from hwy 19s.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work in albuquerque, traveling west on academy from the intersection of academy  and wyoming. dark out. noticed this object flying from ne to sw. this is totally wrong for any kind of approach pattern for the airport. actually 180 degrees out of what is normal or possible. best guess 500-1000 feet altittude. moved at twice the speed of the choppers from kirtland but way to slow for anything that big at that altitude. could not see the craft's shape due to darkness and light pollution. did see 3 bright white lights pointing straight down. one in the lead and two trailing to form a triangle. huge diameter on these lights. best guess 4- 6 feet in diameter. very bright. in the center, a red light. no sound. i almost hit the curb a couple of times. i have studied aircraft most of my adult life, can identify most military air craft and have never seen anthing like this. it wasn't right. nothing in the media about it. hmm. they are testing the ossprey here, but this was not it either. i see them all the time. i saw an artist's rendering on your program on the history channel that was the spitting image of what i saw. it did not change direction and disappeared into the sw valley of albuquerque as i had to turn north to go to work. i have studied ufos for about 15 years and was excited to have seen this. it did not scare me, just wonder and amazement.
content.summary: See below.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:57am time approximate i [cms/pid/tg] a security guard with [cms/pid/tg] while at the menlo park veteren's home notice on my security monitor a disc shaped object changing shape with a blue glowing ring located around it. i also took notice of the ground under it(glowing blue as well) i shot 1:00min of very clear footage(which i still have) on my cam phone as well as a picture taken not too long after the craft vanished(of what appears to be a face in the rocks by our american flag) *all of the footage is clear as day. the whole event took place over a time of 15mins* and was witnessed by myself as well as another security guard and residents within the va home. i have no in my life encountered anything like this. it made no noise,it was metallic(you can see in vid2 on my phone) the top reflects light(gleaming) 

key points:

1st: noticed the object on security cams located at my security desk
2nd: the object was hovering by a vehicle parked in the parking lot directly outside and to the left. the object had a blue ring around it(as seen in the video's) and changed shape(got bigger then reduced it's size) *at one point i personally witnessed the aforementioned object flatten itself out completely.
3rd: i lost site of the object when it glowed very brightly then was gone(just gone) as if it vanished.

*enclosed are the vid's taken off phone and the pic*
you may contact me if you like regarding this matter...As of now i'm a believer...
content.summary: Disc shaped object with blue glowing ring around it(changing shape) taken at menlo park veteren's hom 12/31/07.

content.detailedDescription:
This afternoon at 3:30 pm (jan. 09, 2009) i stepped out onto my deck for a break, as i do many times each day, and looked up to the western sky and was startled at what i thought was a passenger airline headed vertically about a mile or so away. i did a double-take visually because i was momentarily confused because there were no wings showing, and it shined with a silvery colored brilliance that had the appearance of glowing-radiating mercury. the object at first glance was approximated at maybe 2000 feet altitude and slowly ascending toward a lightly clouded sky.  it appeared to be as long as a typical 727 passenger cabin and as wide or maybe wider, and somewhat flat on ends.  i began to reach for my binoculars that i keep handy, while trying not to loose visual with the object. the object began to speed it���s ascent as i managed to uncap my bino���s as to get a closer look. before i could raise them to my eyes it began fading out, as if it were actually becoming translucent or transparent. i quickly looked thru the binoculars at the exact area, but there was nothing there! it had vanished without me even blinking an eye! i was amazed to say the least, because it never appeared to make any directional or velocity change. it simply dematerialized into thin air. 

thirty minutes after my observation a small grey/black helicopter arrived in the area circling for ten to fifteen minutes.  ironically, the previous day i had witnessed this same helicopter hovering stationary for 20 minutes in the vicinity until it departed at late sunset.  keep your eyes to the sky people!
content.summary: Large brilliant silver colored cylindrical-cigar shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

i was wondering if you know anything about a light seen in northern indiana from 820 to 925 ish last night. i didn't get off work till 820 and work in kokomo the light followed me all the way home and at one put when 2 fighter jets flew towards it but underneath it it took off like 5 times faster than it was travel for the last 20 mins. it jumped ahead of me maybe 5 miles hard to say because it was parallel with me and not real close. it must have stop moving because i never lost sight of it. i was close to home and was worried i wouldn't be able to take pictures of it, but then it started to come towards logansport it crossed the front of my car while i was still headed in the same direction i had been for last 20 mins. so it went from my left side to in front of me way ahead still on left to directly in the front of my car to slightly right in all. i then turn putting it back on my left side for about a min. then i turned on my road that follows the river and it was in front of me again. it appeared to be sitting above the wooded area in between the logansport state hospital and gergotown a town of about 150 people but it was on the opposite side of the river the town is on. i took maybe 30 pictures of this light which change colors from white to blue to green yellow red orange. my father also saw this light. with high powered binoculars the light looked to pulse and the colors seemed to move to gather not solid colors which appears in the pictures. it was below the clouds are around the clouds. it lit up the clouds around it. i thought maybe something was burning up coming into the atmosphere but after it not moving for  at least 10 -15 i decided that wasn't it. on my way home i couldn't see any stars and this was low so i thought it was a tower light and was why i kept looking at it waiting for me to pass the tower i made it all the way to galveston before i realized it was moving with me. i thought maybe it was a re-fueler with it runway lights on sense grissom is right there and they fly all the time until the jets which looked like warthogs flew underneath it and it took off. the speed it took off at is not surprising of the jets i seen at the base except for it doing it with no after burner flair and so low to the ground. also it stop for 10-15 at least by my house also when it went over the town as i drove threw them galveston and walton it seem to slow down because i had to slow down to 35 mph and it never passed at one put fell back being me a little so the only jet i have seen that could do this is a raptor but looking at this thing threw binoculars it was not a raptor it was a perfect ball. the light admitted looked brighter in middle and towards bottom but not all the way down the top and bottom were same brightness. i have seen jets from raptor to c10 at night and it was nothing i have seen before. it was 3 degrees outside so im not sure hwo long i was outside watching this thing thats why i say 10 -15 it sat there. i went inside to get on msn and tell my friend to go out and look to see if he could see it from his house. it took maybe 3 mins to convince him i wasnt messing with him. he said he didn't see anything so i went back out to look it was gone. only regret i didn't see it leave, but it did leave after not moving for 10 -15 mins it was gone no where in the sky to be found. i took about 30 pictures some are a little shacking because it was cold i have an 5 mega pixel cannon with telescopic lens its a good camera and there good pictures. please do not post my pictures anywhere with out my permission. im not sure if i want to even tell anyone about this in real life. they probably think i a nut and i live in a small town. i tagged them with my on line handle and a blog i run because that i ll have to tag with just in case. again do not post these please. {cms}






sorry about spelling and grammer mistakes

thank you for your time
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multicolored ball in northern indiana.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south at about 11pm i saw a large white light low in the sky ahead. i could sense rather than see the enormity of the object, it was huge! about 1/2 mile later i stopped my car and took a pic with my camera phone shich was the only camera available. the full moon reflected off the object at times and i could almost see the shape of the objct. i travelled south for 30 minutes where i reached the interatate and continued south. at this time the light was more visible and a smaller light was also seen near the large light. the lights began to move up and down opposite each other as nif they were dancing. this activity lasted more than one minute. when i arrived at my destination a friend came outside and was also able to see the bright light. the sky in the distance hsd a pink glow and looked cloudy. it became difficult to see the object. i snapped pics with camera phone at that time as well the object made no sound that i could hear
content.summary: Driving south huge light noted in front of me low in sky. i stopped car &took pic with camera fone.

content.detailedDescription: isawi was standing in my back yard cleaning gutters wheni saw theobject  above treetops on eastern horizon .I watched it cross to western horizon and out of view in less than 1  minute its color is difficult to describe it was the color of a sunrise or sunset sort of pinkish orange  it was metal but looked warm  it was higher than most jets  but was o lot bigger approx 1/2 inch in the sky whereas jets usually seem about 1/8 inch or smaller it crossed the sky faster than any jet i have ever seen  even when they used to break the sound barrier also it was silent with no jetstream noted. i snapped about 6 pics with my camera phone which i happened to hae with me at the time. i emailed the pics to my computer and can barely see it on the screen except with a magnifying glass. to enlarge the pics causes the object to become pixillated. i watched the object intil it disappeared from view headed in a northwestt direction. i was amazed at the spped the object was travelling and that it made no sound. no one believed me when i told them about it later that day. i felt sure that what i saw was a ufo when i first saw it. it travelled across te sky in astraight line faster than anything i have ever seen in the sky
content.summary: Object seen in daylight traveled horizon to horizon less than 1 min no sound no jetstream.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to beed at app. 11:pm. some tine in the wee hours i was awoke to find five figures standing at the foot of my bed. i was startled needless to say. but at the same time i felt reassured that nothing harmful would happen to me. the tallest was app. 7' tall, the next was 6'-61/2'tall, the next was 5'-51/2'tall, the next was 4'-4 1/2' tall the next was 3'tall. they all had on monks roabs with hood i could not make out any features. they were not minicing, just standing there observing me. i was aware of a force field around my bed, clear opaque, blue opaque, and green opaque, the force field moved in wavy lines upward to the ceiling of my bedroom, between me and my visitors.   i recall that my covers were neetly folded under my arms, with my arns laying atop the covers. (i never sleep this way,even in the summer, i have to cover my arms.) i was flat of my back, and i never sleep this way i sleep on my side....... it was extreamly cold.... inside the forcefield.. my arms felt like they would freeze off if i did not get them under the cover. but i could not move... i struggled and struggled until i finally got my arms underneath me... and some of the covers over my shoulders... the last thing i am aware of is the male figure saying "she's strong isn"t she?" ans a female voice saying "yes she is." and i was asleep again. the memory was very vivid in my memory the next morning.  and i have not forgotten it since. i strongly feel it was a true experience, not a dream. i do not think i could have felt the extream cold i did in a dream.  this was real.  i have been an experiencer of these kind of events all my life. and to boot i think it has been going on for five generations, my grandmother, mother, myself my son and daudhter, and my 4 grandchildren.  this is for jackrabbit hunters in victorville oro., 6/11/1959 grande calif.  i have seen them also. contact me. {pid}
content.summary: Was awaken from sound sleep to find five(5) figures standing at the foot of my bed. i was inside a force field. very cold.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out front window and noticed a bright star like object. it was quite bright. it would go out and then light up again. this happened for about 45 min. then it was gone. about the size of a small car. glowed white,and silver light.It was fairley low.
content.summary: Looked out window and saw a bright star like object, tree level. it blinked on and off. after 45min. it dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed stationary venus-like object aprox 20degrees off horizon in sw/s sky. object moved like 4degrees further westward. stopped.
looked for beacon and directional lights; none visible.
watched object for aprox 5 more minutes as it remained motionless.
object again moved aprox. 4degrees further westward. again stopped.
noticed position of fisrt tree, second tree, and third tree.
ground referenced used as sky was partially overcast but many stars visible; on-and-off. checked time and watch compass. 
noted it as 10:20pm and n-s reference. object still stationary at swxs position. still no beacon or directional light visisble.

from intial point of sighting ( first tree as reference )
 object relocated 6 times within a total viewing period of aprox 20 - 30 minutes.
decided to go for camera and in less than 2 minutes object no longer visible in sky.

no trail vivible, no plane sound, object vector flat.

misc,
would have believed it to be plane except:
1. no beacon or directional lights visible.
2. object moved, stopped, stayed motionless for 2 to 5 minutes. moved again. stopped again. remaining motionless again for about 10 minutes. moved again. stopped again. remained motionless for like another 5 minutes.
3. planes at night can often appear to be motionless relative to their path of flight. when this happens it is the same until angle of view saturates... object's vector was flat. object moved, stopped, stayed. repeated several times.  
vector not towards me or at angles towards me. 

4. unable to reference object against anything of known size.
   a. unable to say altitude of object.
   b. unable to say size of object.
appeared much larger than any satelite i have seen to date.
could have easily been a very bright venus except for different quality of light than a star. plus location and movement.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Venus-like object sighted...But in sw sky, moving across wind, stops, then moved again.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright green object speed across the sky. definitely not an aircraft or a meteor, definitely a solid object. moved parallel to the ground at a speed to fast for an aircraft and too slow for a meteor. moved from either hopkinton or penacook to chichester

mufon: feel free to contact me at the provided email for more information
content.summary: Low altitude bright green sphere glides incredibly fast across sky with green trail.

content.detailedDescription: I left my office around 6:30 pm. as i approached the intersection of skylab and springdale in huntington beach, i noticed an unusual "string" of lights above the trees toward the east. i couldn't see any kind of shape because it was quite dark, and whatever it was appeared to be a few miles away, possibly over the neighboring city of fountain valley. at first i thought it may be a street light obscured by a tall tree or even a plane or helicopter--maybe even a blimp. but orange county has busy skies, and i compared this string of lights to other objects in the sky that were obviously planes and helicopters. it was definitely neither. as i turned right on springdale, i noticed whatever it was was also heading south at what appeared to be a pretty low altitude. i wasn't afraid (probably because it wasn't that close). i was intrigued and almost mesmerized by this mysterious object. as i kept one eye on the road and one on the object, i noticed that it had several lights (8 to 12, as i recall) arranged in something of a crescent-shape. one light was not lit, and this unlit light seemed to pass to the left. although i couldn't see the object, just the lights, this light activity made the object appear to be rotating in a clock-wise direction. at the same time, the object moved slowly and very smoothly, parallel to the ground in a southbound direction. going 45 mph, i was able to keep up with it for about 2 miles until i had to turn off at my destination. i really thought my imagination was playing tricks on me until a co-worker showed me the mufon web site today and showed me similar accounts of what i saw around the same time. now i'm starting to wonder if it really was something.
content.summary: A crescent-shaped string of lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: it was about 2001-2002 a co-worker and i were travelling back from belle glades on (state road 98) southern blvd heading east bound, when we saw something bright in the sky, we thought to see a falling star. the object was on the right side of the truck. it was red, blue and yellow oval in shape, we observe it for about 7-8 seconds when suddenly we saw two fighter jets and a hellicopter come from behind us, the object that was on my right driver side door window (north) and about 500 feet in the air suddenly flew a mile or so (north,northeast) in front of us, my eyes followed as i saw the object moved to my left hand side windshild in my company truck, as the jets and helo adjust direction, the object flew (south, southeast) to our right of my windshield again the jets turned the helo followed, the odject flew back to the left hand side windshield (northeast) and flew straight up to the heavens. when i first saw the this object i had no reaction, but i always remember what happen that morning and how much scared, disbelive and excited i felt.  i still seek an answer, funny thing is on a ufo show couple years later, someone painted a picture of the same object i saw, and they did not live anywhere near me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red, blue and yellow, are not only the primary colors.

content.detailedDescription:
As a 10 yr. old boy, living in beaverton, oregon, i would frequently sleep in the backyard during the summer,  with my brother (a year older than i), and frequently some other neighbor friend(s).  this particular evening, there were three of us staring at the sky, looking for meteors, and talking and joking.  suddenly we observed perhaps a quarter mile away, at perhaps 150-200ft. above the ground, an array of lights slowly moving (20mph or so)right at us!  soon afterward, it became obvious that this was a saucer shaped craft.  i ran inside the house, and screamed for my father to get outside now!  he reacted quickly, we all ran back out,  and were able to see the craft go directly overhead, and then the neighbors trees obscured the sighting.  the craft had multiple white lights in the front, with a red and a blue light at the edges illuminating the round shape.  i recall feelings of fear, yet excitement.  seeing the photos at the following website http://www.Ufoevidence.Org/photographs/section/recent/photo416.Htm 
i got a rush of energy, as i found almost exactly what i saw 41yrs. ago.  this is a 15 second episode in my life that will not be forgotten.
content.summary: Silent disc/saucer direct slow flight overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Grandmas house playing. cousins saw the object at night sky.Object had lights  around it.It looked like a cornucopia shape.Object landed at mine and set there for awhile then lifted off very slowly,it gradually blended with the night sky and disappeared.   next object was a large flourescent rectangle hovering for quiet awhile. next object was a large flash like a lift off.   culberson and hudspeth countys. at the time the military was doing somekind of maneuvers.
content.summary: Teardrop landed at mine sight after 30 minutes lifted off and disappeared /flourencent  rectangle object  in nigt sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Light came from the northwest at about 500 to 600 ft and moved over our heads going southwest there was not any sound coming from the sphere.
we see planes all the time and this was not a plane.
content.summary: White light.

content.detailedDescription: On the night the moon was its brightest i was taking pictures of the moon without a flash and my wife and i were amazed to see the ufo changing its direction and moving quite fast one spot to the next you can also see in some of the pics i have were it looks like 1 to 3 objects moving in a simalar directions i have over 100 pics of this event and we are very curios to find out what these objects might be
content.summary: I was taking a picture with my digital camera and caught the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: First i went outside to smoke i looed up and seen what i thougt was a star. i looked again then it started to move slow no sound and it did not blink it was just a white light until i seen your show i thought i was just crazy i have not seen anything since then                                                                                                                                                                yours ricky
content.summary: Stayed in one spot until i smoked my cig then moved.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were walking back from my sisters house that evening.  when we were about to cross the street on edinger and raitt st. i noticed some lights directly above us.  at first i thought it was a blimp or air plane of some sort, but then when i told my brother, we both realized it was not.  it had a disc shape look to it, with lights going around the outer bottom rim of the object with a red blinking light on top.  i really did not know what to think, it was too real...   what i do know is that it was not an airplane, or a helicopter, or a blimp....  one thing i did notice is other people saw it as well and they could not identify it either, they were in shock...  it hovered for a few minutes then started moving south south west and finaly went out of sight...
content.summary: Disc like features with bright lights around the bottom outer rim moving right to left.

content.detailedDescription:
It has been my custom for the past six months to take my dogs for a run early in the mornings.  usually i go out to alpine road and turn south to where handel rd. intersects.  on the morning of january 4th i was driving on harney toward alpine when i saw ahead approx. 2 miles a large white light.  i thought at first it was a plane's landing lights, but then the color pattern started. it turned red-violet, then a bright blue-green and back to white, so i knew it was not a plane.  it seemed to be stationed over the p g & e substation that is east of hwy 88 on kettleman.
i lost sight of it because of trees, as i turned on alpine rd. but when i could see it again, it seemed to still be in the same area of the sky.  because of the change in my position, it, too, seemed to be a little south of where it had been.  now it turned back to white and moved, very fast up ward maybe 15 degrees.  it again began it's damcing movement and turned red violet, then blue-green and back to white.  when it turned to white it moved far up, maybe 45 degrees and zip, it was gone.
this all happened over a time of about 2 hours.  i first saw it about 12:30, athis is one of the more spectacular objects i have nd when it vanished it as 2:45 am
this was one of the more spectacular objects i have seen and i enjoyed the show while it lasted.
content.summary: Large bright light changed colors and direction very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
At 23.10 hrs, on the above date, i alighted from the car which was bringing me home from the factory where i had just finished a late shift.A fellow passenger,who lived on a nearby estate,also got out of the car. having wished him good night, we parted company and i made my way home. as i did so, i looked eastward into the evening sky and saw three diffuse blue lights hanging stationary in the sky in a triangular formation behind a thin cloud layer. 

as i got closer to home,and away from the glare of the street lights, i could make them out more clearly.Intrigued,i went directly into the garden for a better look.The garden is bordered by an 8ft hedge which blocks out most of the street lighting. i watched the stationary lights for approximately 30 seconds before entering the house and going to the east facing bedroom, where my wife was watching tv. as we watched, the lights began moving in random directions, independent of one another. suddenly, a fourth light split away from the southerly light and moved across to the northerly light, taking about four seconds to do so. it then went back to its original position, passing just above and in front of the easterly light,which looked dimmer than the rest. at one point three of the lights converged then split apart again. they made sudden directional changes and accelerated and decelerated in a simialr fashion. 

by now, i had gotten my praktica w14x25 binoculars and was watching the lights from the open bedroom window. i trained them on one of the moving lights and noticed that as it passed through thinner cloud cover its diffuse glow intensified, giving me the impression that it was an internally lit light source behind the cloud and not, as i had suspected,the product of a ground based light source being shone onto the cloud face, such as a lazer or searchlight. i rejected the latter scenario as there were no attendant searchlight beams.The former theory is possible, but for the fact that the light which travelled across a thinner cloud cover should have dimmed, and not brightened,because there would be fewer water droplets to reflect it.

moving into the garden again,my wife still watching from the window,i continued my observation of the aerial manouvres through the binoculars. suddenly, the lights simultaneously blinked out and never returned.

it was some time before i actually fell asleep that night. various scenarios kept presenting themselves to my mind. i had already rejected the ground based light source theory.

the event took place close to newcastle airport.Could they have been coventional aircraft? i quickly ruled out this theory, too, because,the observed lights were not accompanied by engine sounds and were electric blue in colour.At no time did i notice standard navigation lights. furthermore, their erratic manouvres,when seemingly in close proximity to one another,would have constituded a 'near miss - something a commercial pilot is trained to avoid at all costs.
content.summary: Three stationary blue lights in triangular formation, and a fourth light travelling back and forth between two of the stationary lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I thought this may be of interest to you.   
i was panning around on the street view of this address at:    
12971 rocky pointe rd, mccordsville, in 46055-9584......And found this object that resembles what i would think a ufo looks like!   if you have any questions, please call me @ [pid/tg]  (hueytown, al)..... also, if you find out anything about it would you please let me know?

[pid/tg]
content.summary: On google maps (street view).
